Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the video clip by implying that it shows supporters of Bernie Sanders failing to identify a single country on a world map.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the individuals shown in the video clip are supporters of Bernie Sanders without any evidence to support this assumption.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the individuals in the video clip are supporters of Bernie Sanders.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video clip was taken from a comedy segment on the "Jimmy Kimmel Live" show and the individuals were randomly selected off the street, not identified as Democrats or Sanders supporters.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the inability to locate countries on a world map is not exclusive to any particular political affiliation, as shown by a similar video clip featuring Republicans.
